subject: FW: Notification of payment received
preview: Good morning,     I have been advised below that the issues with GST and the incorrect order numbers are happening on PayPal payments now. Can you please look into this as a matter of urgency?     Tha

full_threads.body:
Good morning,


I have been advised below that the issues with GST and the incorrect order numbers are happening on PayPal payments now. Can you please look into this as a matter of urgency?


Thanks


Bonnie​​​​ Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

+61 0408331966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211


CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. Any unauthorised review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.




From: AU Receivable <HardwareAR@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 25 October 2024 9:33 AM
To: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: RE: Notification of payment received


HI Bonnie


We are receiving the payments now


However the other 2 issues are still happening


Regards


Anne‑Marie​​​​ Van Gestel
Credit Supervisor


avangestel@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

4 Secombe Place Moorebank 2170 NSW

0419634218

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

+61 2 8526 1832

From: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 25 October 2024 9:13 AM
To: AU Receivable <HardwareAR@mayohardware.com.au>; Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: RE: Notification of payment received


Hi Anne-Marie,


I thought the issue was only on orders paid for via Secure Pay which is now switched off. This is a PayPal payment so are you saying the issue is occurring with these as well now?


Thanks


Bonnie​​​​ Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

+61 0408331966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

From: AU Receivable <HardwareAR@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 25 October 2024 8:05 AM
To: Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: FW: Notification of payment received


Hi Leah


Are you able to amend the PO number to 7069 and correct the pricing and pretty sure the stock needs to come out of Brisbane


Bonnie how is going to get the file corrected with the pricing and order number


Regards




Anne‑Marie​​​​ Van Gestel
Credit Supervisor


avangestel@mayohardware.com.au
